doc.field: American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
Series II: General Administrative and Locals Files
Series II: General Administrative and Locals Files

This series contains material pertaining to the administrative functions of Local 1707/DC 1707, its departments, locals, committees and chapters. General administrative material includes correspondence and memoranda, financial records and reports, and items that document Coucil elections, Executive Board, organizing, staff meetings, committees, and other areas. Locals and Retirees Chapter files contain similar material, as well as some trustee board and other meetings files, and records of funds for various locals.
